about_the_game:
In Last Stand: Zombie Horde, you face off against relentless waves of zombies, each level getting tougher than the last. Armed with basic weapons, your mission is simple: survive and progress through 100 challenging levels. The zombies grow stronger with each level, and the key to staying alive is purchasing new weapons using the Bitcoins you collect from each kill.

Throughout the game, gather Bitcoins to buy a variety of powerful weapons to help you tackle the growing zombie threat. Each weapon offers a unique advantage, so choose wisely to maximize your chances of survival. With no complicated upgrades—just straight-up weapon buying—you can focus on blasting your way through the undead and making it to the next level.

Key Features:

  • 100 Levels of Zombie Mayhem: Fight through 100 levels, each one packed with more dangerous and aggressive zombies. How far can you go?

  • Buy Powerful Weapons: Collect Bitcoins to purchase a range of weapons, from pistols to shotguns. Each weapon is crucial for surviving the increasingly tough zombies.

  • Tactical Gameplay: Use your weapons strategically to deal with zombies in different ways. Speed, power, and accuracy all play a part in your survival.

  • Simple, Addictive Combat: No upgrades—just buy what you need and survive the next level. Quick and easy to pick up, but hard to put down.

  • Collect Bitcoins: Earn Bitcoins by defeating zombies, and use them to unlock a variety of weapons to help you survive.

Can you make it through all 100 levels? Collect Bitcoins, buy your weapons, and see how long you can last against the zombie apocalypse in Last Stand: Zombie Horde.

  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: All Pc's can run it.
